out_file.description: Flask application serving the arXiv CS Daily webpage with routes for the homepage, category-specific navigation, and paper detail pages.
List of required Python packages for the Flask web application and data fetching from arXiv.
Module for fetching and processing arXiv data, including paper lists, details, and citation generation.
HTML template for the homepage, featuring domain-specific navigation and a daily updated list of computer science preprints.
HTML template for the paper detail page, displaying comprehensive metadata, direct PDF access, and citation tools.
CSS stylesheet for the arXiv CS Daily webpage, providing a clean, responsive design for navigation and content.
JavaScript file for client-side interactivity, primarily handling one-click copying of citations to the clipboard.
